Author: fluffyfinaland
Text: No, you’re absolutely right! It was mostly just venting but it’s good to hear it from someone other than myself. I tell myself that same thing every time I have this conversation with myself but still don’t listen which makes it all the more frustrating. I just am so fed up with myself, you know?

Author: PieldeSapo
Text: Just a thought, you're saying you tell yourself that it's gonna be the last time and "tomorrow we'll eat low cal and restrict" maybe that's part of what makes you keep bingeing because you're literally telling yourself. I'm not going to eat anymore later so might aswell keep on going, I NEED to eat these things now otherwise I can't have them again in god knows how long. Have you tried telling yourself, hey it's ok I can have this tomorrow instead! I don't need to eat it all rn, there are many more days to eat these things.  Unsolicited advice, please ignore it if you just wanted to vent.
